page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content: A REGULAR BUS SERVICE TO BP. AUCKLAND AND DARLINGTON MEANT PEOPLE WERE EASILY ABLE TO TRAVEL ALLOWING THEM TO MOVE LONGER DISTANCES TO WORK. CHILDREN IN THOSE DAYS PLAYED DIFFERENT GAMES FROM NOW SUCH AS ROUNDERS, WHIP AND TOP, MARBLES, HOPSCOTCH, HOOPS, SKIPPING, TIP -CAN AND MANY SINGING AND BALL GAMES. LIFE NOWADAYS IS BETTER IN THAT WE HAVE A BETTER STANDARD OF LIVING AND ARE SPARED A LOT OF THE OLD DRUDGERY WITH MODERN LABOUR SAVING DEVICES. ONE OF THE DISADVANTAGES OF THE PRESENT DAY IS THAT THE PACE OF LIFE IS QUICKER AND MUCH NOISIER.
